title: JESU MEEK AND GENTLE

author.name: George R. Prynne
author.bio: George R. Prynne was an English Anglican priest and hymn writer.

lyrics:
Jesu meek and gentle
Son of God most high
Pitying loving Savior
Hear Thy childrenâ€™s cry.

Pardon our offences
Loose our captive chains
Break down every idol
Which our soul detains.

Give us Holy freedom
Fill our Hearts with Love
Draw us Holy Jesus
To the realms above.

Lead us on our journey
Be Thyself the way
Through terrestrial darkness
To celestial day.

Jesu meek and gentle
Son of God most high
Pitying loving Saviour
Hear, Thy children's cry.
